application.name: Pyrasite GUI
application.summary: A tool for interacting with running Python processes

description.p: A graphical interface for Pyrasite that lets you easily monitor, analyze, introspect, and alter running Python programs.
On startup Pyrasite GUI will present you with all the running Python processes it can find on your system. This is anything with a Python interpreter embedded in it; even Vim.
Pyrasite GUI can produce graphs of process activity, display stack traces, show dumps of objets in memory, and even produce callgraphs of execution... all without the bother of code instrumentation.
